author: Reppy 07
comment: You are awesome. Dev will actually reply to emails and in detail. Super awesome to see such dedication to your own product, it's not something I see much anymore. Updated from 4 to 5 stars without hesitation. Would still love to see a battery indicator ;P

reply.author: KvnX Dev
reply.content:
Hello Reppy 07,

thanks for your detailed review! What do you mean with "fullscreen"? Can you write an email to kvnx1337@gmail.com to explain it? So maybe I can fix it, if there is a bug.

I am glad you like this watch face. New date formats or even custom date formats are on my todo. A battery level indicator is not planned right now.

Thanks!

author: Adam Remoundos-Green
comment: It's a great watch face. Does what it says and more. Love the minimalistic look of it and love all the options. Wish it had a few more things on the face (maybe weather...) but otherwise works great. Also if your wondering if this works with square watches it does. 😉  Sony SmartWatch 3

author: Michael Crowell
comment: Love it! Its my favorite watch face, but it does have one short coming. On my ZenWatch 2, Ambient Mode doesn't work with it! It'll go into ambient mode then just away away after a few seconds It's something I can live without and I still use it daily, but its still a little problem.

author: Joe Montesano
comment: I've run into a problem that I can't seem to figure out. I can get the watch face onto my Android Wear device, but I can't customize the face at all. It's beautiful as is, but I can't figure out hot to customize it from my Galaxy S6. :/

author: Angel Ibarrondo
comment: App never loaded on Android Wear. Disconnected and connected from the phone and nothing. I really wanted to use it. Android 7.1-Moto 360 1st G.

author: Kyriakos Giannakis
comment: Simply one of the best watch faces out there. Really customizable and I love that there isn't an extra app that goes with it (I want my app drawer as uncluttered as possible), just the menu available via the android Wear app. Also, no ads! Great job!

author: Andy Mangrum
comment: Best for it's minimal design and customizations. Really great watch face. Only issue is 2 of the date formats (Sa 18. Jul & Saturday 18. Jul) show the two digit month instead of the two digit day.

author: Stefan Bramandhie
comment: Design is Okay. but i love the simplicity and the appearance options. however,  is it only me? the date stuck on 9. no matter what date, it only shows 9.

author: Kyle Mokma
comment: Love the look of the watch and the battery life I get when using it. Wouldn't mind more background and date format options.

author: Andrew Jaru
comment: Great watchface with lots of customization options. They all convey lots of information with very little clutter. It's also easy on my battery. Love it

author: Steven Gardner
comment: Does not work, installed on watch but unable to find the app. Also on phone no shortcut to home screen, app is hiding somewhere

author: Aaron Arndt
comment: Love the look and feel of this face. Best one I've found so far can't wait for more updates to come! Maybe with weather data?

author: Brandon Mardis
comment: Does not work for android wear 2.0, can not install in wear appstore.

author: Tyler Wolf
comment: Looks amazing. And from what I can see on my watch it functions great. But I can not find or even open the app to customize the watch face on a Google pixel XL. 😭

author: Kevin Merkel
comment: Won't allow me to adjust settings on Android 2.0 watch say use app. App has no settings available.

author: Ronald Rivera
comment: This watch face no is compatible with wear 2.0

author: Will Knight
comment: Can't open the app on my phone, and can't customise on the watch, however the face looks great without customisation
Doesn't work on Android Wear 2.0

author: jacob26referibles
comment: It's fantastic. I only wish there was a battery counter!

author: J D
comment: Watch face is no longer showing up as an option in the wear app or the watch. I'm running wear 2.0

author: Jeff Knox
comment: Can't figure out how to edit settings. Moto 360 v2 and Samsung Galaxy S6.

author: Marko Cekić
comment: It just looks awesome I like how subtle the background is but it's still noticable

author: JMO 19DELTA
comment: Elegant and simple. Good work.

author: TechDroid
comment: I love those watch faces but I don't see them on the Android Wear app

author: Anthony Adams
comment: Very nice watch face, I only wish I could see the weather as well.

author: Tony Claremont
comment: Great looking watch face! Just wonder what energy safe mode does.

author: mahmoud atef
comment: Waiting for updates..  Also needs more backgrounds and fonts but actually love it

author: Phil Steenwyk
comment: Love this been looking for this exact setup for years thank you so much

author: Daniel S
comment: may 14 '17.  doesn't have much info..

author: Aditya Sharma
comment: One of the best watchface.. kudos to the dev for making such a beautiful watchface.

author: Duc Dang
comment: Thanks for amazing design with details customized able.
So simple yet beautiful!! Loved it!!

author: Ofek Ashery
comment: Beautiful watch face!!

author: Caleb Brown
comment: Amazing watch app

author: Darren F
comment: Very nice and elegant

author: Maciek R
comment: The best watch face if you're looking for something simple and useful. It shows time, date, weekday, and if you don't want to have nay background pic you can set alpha to 100%. I have tried many watch faces before and I think I'll stick to this one for a long time.

reply.author: KvnX Dev
reply.content:
Hello Maciej Rozmyslowicz,

thanks for your nice feedback! I am glad you like it. And yes, just turn it to 100% and get a black amoled friendly background :-)

Stay tuned for updates soon!

author: Leng Chea
comment: Perfect and very simplistic but it would have been a 5 star if the dev include the "fade to ambient" option, as what it is right now is a bit too fast. I'll change to 5 star if you can include that in the setting.

reply.author: KvnX Dev
reply.content:
Hello Leng Chea,

thanks for your feedback.

I just added it on my ToDo. I will check if it is possible.

Greetings from germany! :-)

author: Aaron Watt
comment: Simple and the wearer's choice. Love this new watch face. My only complaint is needs MORE customization

reply.author: KvnX Dev
reply.content:
Hello Aaron Watt,

thanks for your review. I am glad you like it.

More customization are planned, but remember: This app will always stay minimalistic, clean and not overloaded. Its important for me and many users to have a watch face which is batteryfriendly.

Thanks!

author: Wesley Knee
comment: Cute app, although I wish the background would randomize or something. They are all quite nice

author: jonas luo
comment: Hi, I can't seem to find a way to access this app. Please help, thanks

reply.author: KvnX Dev
reply.content:
Hello jonas luo,

thanks for your review. Be sure you install the app from the smartphone to reduce sync issues which are also known on other apps. If this wont help, write a short mail to kvnx1337@gmail.com . I will send you a better information.

Thanks!
